verses.verse: Then all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> was gathered together <S%H6950><s%> <S%H8735><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, from Dan <S%H1835><s%> even to Be'er-Sheva <S%H884><s%>, with the land <S%H776><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> in Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%>.

And the chief <S%H6438><s%> of all the people <S%H5971><s%>, even of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, presented <S%H3320><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves in the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> footmen <S%H376><s%> <S%H7273><s%> that drew <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8802><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>.

(Now the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were gone up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to Mizpeh <S%H4709><s%>.) Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, Tell <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> us, how was <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8738><s%> this wickedness <S%H7451><s%> ?

And the Levi <S%H3881><s%> <S%H376><s%>, the husband <S%H376><s%> of the woman <S%H802><s%> that was slain <S%H7523><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%> that belongeth to Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, I and my concubine <S%H6370><s%>, to lodge <S%H3885><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

And the men <S%H1167><s%> of Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against me, and beset <S%H5437><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> round about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon me by night <S%H3915><s%>, and thought <S%H1819><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to have slain <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8800><s%> me: and my concubine <S%H6370><s%> have they forced <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, that she is dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And I took <S%H270><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my concubine <S%H6370><s%>, and cut her in pieces <S%H5408><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> her throughout all the country <S%H7704><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: for they have committed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> lewdness <S%H2154><s%> and folly <S%H5039><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
Behold, ye are all children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; give <S%H3051><s%> <S%H8798><s%> here <S%H1988><s%> your advice <S%H1697><s%> and counsel <S%H6098><s%>.

And all the people <S%H5971><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, We will not any <S%H376><s%> of us go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to his tent <S%H168><s%>, neither will we any <S%H376><s%> of us turn <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into his house <S%H1004><s%>.
But now this shall be the thing <S%H1697><s%> which we will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>; we will go up by lot <S%H1486><s%> against it;

And we will take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of an hundred <S%H3967><s%> throughout all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and an hundred <S%H3967><s%> of a thousand <S%H505><s%>, and a thousand <S%H505><s%> out of ten thousand <S%H7233><s%>, to fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> victual <S%H6720><s%> for the people <S%H5971><s%>, that they may do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, when they come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to Giv`ah <S%H1387><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, according to all the folly <S%H5039><s%> that they have wrought <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
So all the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> against the city <S%H5892><s%>, knit together <S%H2270><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%>.

And the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> men <S%H582><s%> through all the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, What wickedness <S%H7451><s%> is this that is done <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8738><s%> among you?

Now therefore deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8798><s%> us the men <S%H582><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of B'liya'al <S%H1100><s%>, which are in Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>, that we may put them to death <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and put away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8762><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> from Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>. But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> would <S%H14><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of their brethren <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>:

But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> out of the cities <S%H5892><s%> unto Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>, to go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8691><s%> at that time <S%H3117><s%> out of the cities <S%H5892><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that drew <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8802><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>, beside the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>, which were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8694><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8803><s%> men <S%H376><s%>.

Among all this people <S%H5971><s%> there were seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8803><s%> men <S%H376><s%> lefthanded <S%H334><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3225><s%>; every one could sling <S%H7049><s%> <S%H8802><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> at an hair <S%H8185><s%> breadth, and not miss <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, beside Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, were numbered <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8694><s%> four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> that drew <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8802><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>: all these were men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H1008><s%>, and asked <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> counsel of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Which <S%H4310><s%> of us shall go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> first <S%H8462><s%> to the battle <S%H4421><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>? And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> shall go up first <S%H8462><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and encamped <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>.

And the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>; and the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> put themselves in array <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to fight <S%H4421><s%> against them at Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>, and destroyed down <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> of the Yisra'ELites <S%H3478><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> encouraged <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8691><s%> themselves, and set their battle <S%H4421><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in array <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where they put themselves in array <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

(And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> until even <S%H6153><s%>, and asked <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> counsel of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Shall I go up <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8800><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%>? And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> against him.)
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> came near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them out of Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and destroyed down <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> again eighteen <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%>; all these drew <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

Then all the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%>, went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the house <S%H1004><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H1008><s%>, and wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and sat <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> there before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and fasted <S%H6684><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> until even <S%H6153><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> and peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> enquired <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, (for the ark <S%H727><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> was there in those days <S%H3117><s%>,

And Pinchas <S%H6372><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aharon <S%H175><s%>, stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> it in those days <S%H3117><s%>,) saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Shall I yet again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> my brother <S%H251><s%>, or shall I cease <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8799><s%>? And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%>; for to morrow <S%H4279><s%> I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them into thine hand <S%H3027><s%>.
And Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> liers in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, and put themselves in array <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>, as at other times <S%H6471><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, and were drawn away <S%H5423><s%> <S%H8717><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%>; and they began <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and kill <S%H2491><s%>, as at other times <S%H6471><s%>, in the highways <S%H4546><s%>, of which one <S%H259><s%> goeth up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> <S%H8677><s%> <S%H1008><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> to Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, about thirty <S%H7970><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, They are smitten down <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8737><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> us, as at the first <S%H7223><s%>. But the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Let us flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and draw <S%H5423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them from the city <S%H5892><s%> unto the highways <S%H4546><s%>.

And all the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%> out of their place <S%H4725><s%>, and put themselves in array <S%H6186><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at Baaltamar <S%H1193><s%>: and the liers in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> came forth <S%H1518><s%> <S%H8688><s%> out of their places <S%H4725><s%>, even out of the meadows <S%H4629><s%> of Giv`ah <S%H1387><s%>.

And there came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H5048><s%> Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8803><s%> men <S%H376><s%> out of all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and the battle <S%H4421><s%> was sore <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: but they knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not that evil <S%H7451><s%> was near <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8802><s%> them.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> smote <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> destroyed <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of the Benjamites <S%H1145><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and an hundred <S%H3967><s%> men <S%H376><s%>: all these drew <S%H8025><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

So the children <S%H1121><s%> of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that they were smitten <S%H5062><s%> <S%H8738><s%>: for the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> to the Benjamites <S%H1145><s%>, because they trusted <S%H982><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto the liers in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> which they had set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> beside Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>.

And the liers in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hasted <S%H2363><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and rushed <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon Giv`ah <S%H1390><s%>; and the liers in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%> drew themselves along <S%H4900><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword <S%H2719><s%>.

Now there was an appointed sign <S%H4150><s%> between the men <S%H376><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> and <S%H5973><s%> the liers in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, that they should make a great <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8685><s%> flame <S%H4864><s%> with smoke <S%H6227><s%> rise up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8687><s%> out of the city <S%H5892><s%>.
